article_title: Video captures teens rampaging through Harrisburg store
article_text:
Video Transcript

DOES NOT APPEAR TO BE SUSPICIOUS. LORI: RIGHT NOW IN HARRISBURG, POLICE ARE STILL WORKING TO IDENTIFY DOZENS OF TEENAGE VANDALS WHO TORE THROUGH THE CITY OVER THE WEEKEND. AND PART OF IT WAS CAUGHT ON CAMERA. SECURITY FOOTAGE SHOWS THEM RANSACKING A MINI-MART, PUSHING SHELVES OUT OF PLACE, THROWING FOOD AROUND, AND STEALING. THE TEENAGERS ALSO WRECKED DOZENS OF VEHICLES IN MIDTOWN, INCLUDING THE POLICE CHIEF'S PERSONAL CAR. I GUESS THEY CALL THEMSELVES HAVING FUN BUT TO THE TAXPAYER AND THE PEOPLE WHO ARE PAYING FOR THIS MISCHIEF, IT IS NOT FUN. LORI: POLICE SAY A 15-YEAR-OLD

article_metadata.author: Lori Burkholder

og.description: Police are looking for the teens who burst into a Harrisburg store, vandalizing and stealing.
